scripts.postinstall: yarn run duplicate && yarn run transpile
scripts.duplicate: cd ./node_modules && rm -rf @hoobs/sdk-transpiled && mkdir -p @hoobs/sdk-transpiled && cp -r @hoobs/sdk/lib @hoobs/sdk-transpiled/lib && cp -r @hoobs/sdk/node_modules @hoobs/sdk-transpiled/node_modules && cp @hoobs/sdk/package.json @hoobs/sdk-transpiled/package.json && cp @hoobs/sdk/yarn.lock @hoobs/sdk-transpiled/yarn.lock
